author: ak4222
content: Hi <@543900561460822016> I was looking at the  Pr https://github.com/ethereum/go-ethereum/pull/26621  and it mentions checksums for each file. However to my understanding the snappy framing format is not deterministic, so this would be an issue cross client implementations.

author: ak4222
content: Is the intention just to provide an integrity check of the file, or is my understanding of snappy framing incorrect?

author: lightclient
content: interesting, i was not aware of this

author: lightclient
content: hm how does this work on p2p then? that is also snappy compressed yet we are able to interoperate across all clients?
